experiences.title: Vice President for Finance
experiences.subtitle: ENGLICOM
experiences.description: As the Vice President for Finance I lead a team of 27 officers, in Term 1 we were able to achieve a Top 3 Finance ranking among DLSU Organizations. Managed a depository fund exceeding P1,500,000.00

experiences.title: Front-End
experiences.subtitle: Application Development
experiences.description: Designed the frontend of a tourism booking application using HTML, CSS, and Handlebars. The application's backend was implemented with MongoDB and JavaScript.

experiences.title: Quality Assurance Tester
experiences.subtitle: Software Engineering
experiences.description: Developed a remote time clock system for client's shift management, featuring account verification and one-time password (OTP) functionality. Integrated the system with a database using MongoDB, and a salary computation module.

experiences.title: Database Studies
experiences.subtitle: Advanced Databases
experiences.description: Constructed a data warehouse combining different data sources, including MySQL and MongoDB, utilizing Apache Nifi. Generated database analysis on the data warehouse using SQL and Excel

experiences.title: Project Management Chairperson
experiences.subtitle: Computer Batch 2T25
experiences.description: Oversaw project management activities including documentation, planning, and monitoring of all events. Directed committee operations, ensuring regular progress meetings and effective task delegation

experiences.title: Team Head for Operations and Logistics
experiences.subtitle: ENGLICOM CNY 2023
experiences.description: Managed logistics and documentation for a five-day flagship event. Coordinated with speakers, performers, food suppliers, and university offices to ensure seamless event execution. Led to a successful event with 1,060 participants.

experiences.title: Team Head for Programs
experiences.subtitle: Camp Sawi 2023
experiences.description: Planned and executed a two-day off-campus event for La Salle Computer Society. In charge of ensuring participant management and oversight throughout the event, guaranteeing all attendees were present and accounted for. Achieved a successful event execution with a team of 10 in the programs committee.

portfolio.title: Time Clock System
portfolio.description: This was my 2nd full stack development experience. This one taught me more about the systematic side of software development for this project we applied SCRUM meetings and communicated with a client for what they need out of our app.

portfolio.title: MyFarm
portfolio.description: This was one of the first few machine projects that I had to make for school. It was a very challenging project since this was my first time working with Java and GUI but I thoroughly enjoyed the experience and am proud of the result.

portfolio.title: Juanderlust
portfolio.description: My first forray into full stack application development. The website was built with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Handlebars, it was also quite a challenging project since we had to build it completely from scratch but it was a great and fun experience.

portfolio.title: Web Portfolio
portfolio.description: This web portfolio is a personal project of mine since I wanted to apply the things I've been learning so far to my life. I thought this would be a good way to measure my capabilities and also find something productive to do with my time.

portfolio.title: Database Development
portfolio.description: This is the starting point of one of my courses for school where we will be tackling advanced databases. The class has been very interesting to me and I am eager to learn more about these topics. So far we have covered ETL Tools and OLAP Functions.
